scripts.upload-assets: npx wrangler kv key put --binding=SITE_ASSETS "index.html" --path="./public/index.html" --remote && npx wrangler kv key put --binding=SITE_ASSETS "styles.css" --path="./public/styles.css" --remote && npx wrangler kv key put --binding=SITE_ASSETS "client.js" --path="./public/client.js" --remote && npx wrangler kv key put --binding=SITE_ASSETS "favicon.svg" --path="./public/favicon.svg" --remote
